content.question: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Describe the model of voting behavior that best reflects most voters’ choice to recall the governor in the scenario. In the context of the scenario, explain how the media’s role as a linkage institution might have affected the voting behavior described in part A. Explain how the electoral process for removing Governor Davis is different from the process for removing a sitting president of the United States.
